description:
From our office in Denver, Colorado, the dedicated legal professionals at the Reddick Moss law firm provide unmatched advocacy and support to a diverse range of clients across our region and throughout the county who have legal needs involving any of the following:

  • Nursing home abuse and neglect
  • Catastrophic personal injuries
  • Wrongful death
  • Medical and hospital negligence
  • Tractor-trailer wrecks and other motor vehicle accidents
  • Product liability
  • Unsafe property conditions and premises liability

Established in 2011 in Little Rock, Arkansas, our law firm now has four total law offices across the United States, and we have recovered more than $500 million in total compensation for our plaintiff clients.

This success is the direct result of our lawyers' extensive legal experience and outstanding legal abilities coupled with our unwavering dedication at helping our clients obtain the justice they deserve. Our lawyers possess more than 50 years of combined legal experience, so you know that you will receive the highest level of representation possible.

In addition, our attorneys have received consistent designations from our peers. Our co-founding attorneys are also AV Preeminent peer-review rated* through Martindale-Hubbell for their remarkable professionalism and service, and we have received dozens of testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients.

To discuss your legal issue with a member of our team, you can contact Reddick Moss to schedule a free evaluation of your claim.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary.

Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
